name: CyberRonin
description:
You find yourself in a post-apocalyptic world after the war you never heared of, on the planet VL - 162, the city of Lashi. You remember almost nothing, but the name of the strange Heiren corporation is firmly in your head. Find out what happened to your home planet, try to correct the mistakes of the past and have an enjoyable and memorable experience in CyberRonin!

This is my first attempt at making a game and I hope you'll enjoy the experience I wanted to convey through it. I tried to make an atmospheric, sometimes mysterious and interesting game, and you have to make sure of this by playing CyberRonin!
